site-description: GreenSun - we specialize in the installation of photovoltaic farms on land and water. Over 1000 MW of completed projects in Europe.
site-keywords: photovoltaics, PV farms, solar panel installation, solar energy, floating solar farms
hero-title: Ground & Floating PV Mounting for EPCs
hero-subtitle:
5 years of implementation • 1000+ MW • Languages: French, English, Polish
Professional photovoltaic structure installation with comprehensive technical support

footer-description: Professional installation of photovoltaic farms on land and water. We create a sustainable energy future across Europe.
about-title: Over 5 years of experience in solar energy
about-desc1: Our experience covers both onshore and offshore projects. Our achievements include participation in the construction of the Les Îlots Blandin floating photovoltaic power plant with a capacity of 74.3 MWp — one of the largest in Europe.
about-desc2: We provide comprehensive technical consulting, project management, and PV installation services. Our teams operate in Poland, France, and other European countries, ensuring the highest quality of workmanship.
services-desc: We offer comprehensive solutions for photovoltaic structure installation on land and water with full technical support.
service1-desc: Comprehensive structure installation on ground-mounted farms with full technical service and EU-compliant documentation
service2-desc: Specialized floating structure installation on water bodies while maintaining the highest safety standards
service1-item2: Drilling and piling (technology selection based on ground conditions)
service2-item1: Water deployment (aquatic logistics, platform launching process)
service3-item2: Progress supervision, reporting, risk management, QA/QC
service3-item4: Handover organization and as-built documentation completion
service3-desc: Professional EPC project support in coordination, supervision and documentation with FR/EN/PL communication
gallery-desc:
The images below are illustrative visualisations (they do not represent specific projects).
They show the implementation process — from preparation and ramming to the assembly of structures and panels — on land and at sea.
contact-desc: Do you have questions about our services? Would you like to receive a quote for your project? Contact us!
form-message-placeholder: Describe your project or ask a question...

cookie-text: This website uses cookies to ensure the best user experience.
why-us-intro:
We have been operating in the industry since 2020. Although we are a newly established team, we have extensive practical experience.
Thanks to our knowledge of typical risks, we anticipate problems and ensure the highest quality.
why-us-spec-desc: Ramming and drilling, pre-assembly, structure and module installation. On water: launching and linking of islands. Dedicated crews and boats.
why-us-exp-desc: We are a new company, but since 2020 our team has led, installed and closed out PV projects in France, Ireland and Poland—with a strong quality focus. 1000+ MW managed and installed. We took part in delivering the largest water-based PV farm in Europe.
why-us-standards-desc: PPSPS and HSE audits. Quality control and torque records, check-sheets. Daily/weekly reports and complete as-built documentation.
why-us-comm-desc: Direct PM contact, weekly status and fast decisions. Documents and reports in FR/EN/PL per client requirements. Clear SLAs and a single point of accountability.
